Premises Planning and System Design

This course will provide an introduction to the key issues involved in the design and management of foodservice facilities, illustrated with examples and assignments drawn from the industry. It presents the basics of foodservice floor plan design, methods employed to carry out building or renovation of restaurant premises

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Read drawings effectively.

+  Use standardized spacing applied in hospitality.

+  Identify architectural constraint required during premises design.

+  Identify the M&E requirements of kitchen/F&B equipment.

+  Explain the role of different actors involved in construction project.

+  Design simple layout with AutoCAD software.
